node.title: Tushar Atre case: Inside the tech executive's kidnapping & murder
node.description: Would surveillance video help investigators crack the case?
node.content: ["Who would target the 50-year-old tech executive-turned-cannabis entrepreneur and would surveillance video help investigators crack the case?", "Tushar Atre was living near the beach in Santa Cruz, California. Friends say he loved adventure and especially surfing.\u00a0", "A neighbor's surveillance cameras captured three individuals walking out of an alley on Pleasure Point Drive in Santa Cruz, California, at 2:48 a.m. Investigators say they are seen heading toward Tushar Atre's residence.", "Tushar Atre was at home asleep around 3 a.m. when employees who were staying with him heard loud noises and banging. One house guest heard two unidentified male voices. They were asking about a safe. The guest then heard the commotion move outside and the sound of cars driving away. A 911 call was made at 3:34 a.m.", "Santa Cruz County Sheriff's officers responded to Tushar's residence within 10 minutes. They found no sign of forced entry.", "Investigators took photos of Tushar's home which they say did not appear ransacked.", "Investigators say Tushar Atre had $80,000 in his bedroom safe. But they say the suspects did not get the safe open.\u00a0", "Investigators found blood in the middle of the street. A white BMW SUV that belonged to Tushar Atre's girlfriend Rachael Emerlye  was missing from his driveway.", "About six hours later, in the Santa Cruz mountains where Tushar had his cannabis farm, investigators found the missing BMW.\u00a0 \u00a0 \u00a0", "About 20 to 30 yards away from the SUV investigators found Tushar Atre's body. He'd been fatally shot and stabbed.\u00a0 \u00a0", "Investigators say Atre's hands were bound with flex-ties.\u00a0 \u00a0 \u00a0", "Neighborhood surveillance cameras captured video showing Tushar running down the street, with his hands tied behind his back, attempting to escape his attackers. Investigators say he was then tackled to the ground and stabbed repeatedly.\u00a0", "Investigators ruled out Rachael Emerlye as a suspect early on. She was out of town at the time of Tushar's kidnapping and murder. Her SUV was examined for DNA and fingerprints.\u00a0 \u00a0 \u00a0", "The Santa Cruz County Sheriff's Office released a portion of surveillance video showing three unidentified suspects. Investigators say one of the suspects appeared to be carrying an assault rifle.    ", "After nearly four months with no apparent leads, the Santa Cruz County Sheriff's Office announced a $200,000 reward for information leading to an arrest. \u00a0", "The Santa Cruz County Sheriff's Office identified a blue sedan on additional surveillance video. The video also showed the white BMW SUV. Soon authorities were able to map out the suspects' possible route.     "]
